A Profile Summary.Summary:
• Formulated experience in Selenium Test automation framework and debugging tools.
• Knowledge of Ranorex Automation tool used in Desktop, Web,Mobile and Cross Browser Platforms.	
• Prepared Acceptance tests, Integration scripts for Regression, Progression and Execute Test Runs with variants for Cross browser testing.
• Proficient in Object Oriented Methodologies Design and Data Structure Algorithm.
• Knowledge of SDLC, STLC and familiarity of working in the Agile environment.
• Administered excellent problem solving and analytical skills that focused on Usability Testing.
• Counseled, Mentored and trained testers within the QA team to get better performance.
• Contributed in recommending test approaches to optimize the delivery schedules.
• Reviewed modules using manual, automated test cases as a team player as well as an individual.
• Good Interpersonal, relationship and negotiation skills required for cross functional teams.
• Understand web development process and manage multiple task in a fast paced environment.

Basic Information.Name: Shalini Puri
Basic Information.Title: Integration and Verification Developer at Ericsson

Education_2.Institute Name: Maharshi Karve Stree Shikshan Sanstha's Cummins College Of Engineering For Women

Experience_2.Description:
• Requirement Gathering, Analyzing, designing and developing automated testing strategies, frameworks and scripts using Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, and Java.
• Designing and Testing using Ranorex Studio for Desktop,Web and Mobile Native Applications.
• Identifying and developing automation test suite from commonly run test case that improved Test Coverage and Test Accuracy.
• Contributing to the Identification, management and closure of the system defects in order to accept automation criteria. 
• Recommending procedures for quality improvements by performing work-flow analysis. 
• Testing, identifying and bug logging and reporting results back to project teams using JIRA.
• Creating user guides and testing documents for the team.

Experience_3.Description:
•	Performed test cases into automated scripts using Java and Selenium Webdriver.
•	Participated in requirement gathering, analysis, design walkthroughs, as well as project meetings to kick start the project.
•	Worked on TestNG, Paramaterization, Tables, Forms, Excel, and POM in Selenium.
•	Gathered and enhanced business/Product requirements and technical specifications to write and execute test plans, test cases in different test environment.
•	Executed SQL queries and store procedures for retrieving information from database as back-end testing.
•	Designed and implemented test cases addressing areas including database impacts, software scenarios, negative testing, security and usability testing using Java.
•	Documented software defects using JIRA bug tracking tool. Actively followed up on resolution and closure of the defects
•	Interact with various teams (technical and non-technical) and work on various projects.

Experience_4.Description:
•	Interacted with Business and Development team to understand requirements, analysis, and design of the applications and work with them on tight deadlines. 
•	Created detailed Test Scenarios and cases according to the Business/Functional requirements. 
•	Performed Functional, Integration, and Cross Browser and Regression tests. 
•	Logged defects with proper priorities and severity using JIRA and report to the lead and developers for continuous improvement and gain satisfaction of the product owner 
•	Worked with the customer support team to identify issues raised by the customers during beta testing. 
•	Facilitated and led presentations and weekly test statistics to management. 
•	Involved in UAT testing by creating specific test plan and test cases according to users’ perspective.
